node.title: Christ Our Righteousness
node.description:
What is Righteous by Faith? What does the expression, “Christ our

Righteousness,” mean? These are terms that we will often hear in the Seventh-day Adventist church, but does anyone really know what is meant? And does it really matter? Ellen White calls it the “Third angel’s message in verity.” Now that sounds important. So maybe it is worth looking at more closely.
